item.title: Docs: Getting Started
item.description:
System requirements

  • macOS 10.9 or later

Installation

  1. Download dmg file from here.
  2. Open a downloaded dmg file.
  3. Move ShowyEdge icon into Applications icon.
  4. Open ShowyEdge from Launchpad.
  5. Preferences will be opened. Change values if needed and then close the window.

What’s next?

  • Configuration

item.title: Docs: How to quit ShowyEdge
item.description:
ShowyEdge keeps running in the background even if you close the preferences window.
To quit ShowyEdge, proceed as follows:

  1. Open preferences window.
  2. Press Quit ShowyEdge button.

item.title: Docs: Open preferences window
item.description: 1. Open ShowyEdge from Launchpad. The preferences window will be shown.

item.title: Docs: How to uninstall ShowyEdge
item.description:
Remove ShowyEdge from your system as follows.

  1. Quit ShowyEdge before uninstallaion.
  2. Open Applications folder in Finder, then move ShowyEdge to trash.

item.title: Docs: Input source color configuration
item.description:
You can change indicator colors of input sources.

  1. Open preferences window.
  2. Press Add custom color button on Preferences.
  3. Change colors.

item.title: Docs: Indicator size configuration
item.description:
Basic

You can change the indicator height.

  1. Open preferences window.
  2. Adjust height.

Advanced

You can put the indicator by custom size and origin.

  1. Open preferences window.
  2. Open Advanced tab, then enable Use custom frame, and then adjust the indicator size and origin.

Tips

  • You can specify size by pixel or percentage of screen.
    • (e.g., width = 100%, height = 20px)
  • Choose lower-left from origin options if you want to put indicator to the bottom of screen.

item.title: Docs: Indicator options
item.description:
• Hide indicator when full screen
  • Show indicator behind app windows
    • This option is useful with custom frame.
      You can use the Desktop background as an indicator.

item.title: Docs: Donwload older versions
item.description: You can download older versions of ShowyEdge from Release notes

item.title: Docs: Resume configuration
item.description:
ShowyEdge will be automatically started at login by default.
Follow instructions if you want to disable the feature.

  1. Open preferences window.
  2. Open Advanced tab, then enable Resume at login.

item.title: Docs: Use beta version
item.description: You can install beta version from Check for beta updates button on Misc tab.

item.title: Docs: Pricing
item.description: ShowyEdge is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.
